ValidationRule.description: If the EPS Indicator is True, Plan Coordinator must be Courtney Lathrop
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: RecordType.Name = "Test_ZachGallagher" && DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) > DATE(2020,2,1) && Elite_Partner_Indicator__c = True && NOT(Plan_Coordinator__r.LastName = "Lathrop") && NOT(Plan_Coordinator__r.LastName = "Gallagher") && ISNULL( Plan_Coordinator__c )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Since this is an EPS FA, The Plan Coordinator Field must equal Courtney Lathrop
